Key Match Events: Garry Rodrigues scored a late winner in stoppage time
Alexander Djiku headed home from Jordan Ayew's corner in the second half
Pre-Game Insights: The Black Stars looking to respond after nightmare tournament last time out
Post-Match Reflections: While there have been signs of promise to this performance, Hughton could really do with a win.
With Egypt up next, failing to find a winner would put huge pressure on a clash against one of the tournament favourites.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cape Verde went ahead in the 17th minute when Rodrigues's shot was parried by Ofori, falling for Monteiro to score
A flying ball strikes Duarte on the arm following a clearance and the check goes to VAR but nothing is given
Painstil only inches away from turning Semenyo's driven cross into the net
